text:
Ready, set, go!
Tap tap, ah, I can't do it after all!

That part, it's the hardest in this song.
I understand why it's difficult to pull off.

It's super tough, right~!
Tap tap, spin spin, bash!
Huh? Is that how you remember it?

It's Asahi-chan's way~
I can't imitate her at all~

I see, then
Mei needs to find her own way.
Doing it in my own style, huh~

Producer-san...
What do you think... about being myself as an idol?

Oh, that's a tough question.
Is there something on your mind?

Well, I was talking to Asahi-chan
about that kind of stuff.

Both Fuyuko-chan and Asahi-chan
have that! It's amazing.

That's amazing, huh...
I think Mei's straightforward approach is really good.

But even if you don't have it now,
there's no need to rush. Take your time to find it.

I see...
Then I'll do that.

Haha,
I wonder what my idol style will be like~
I'm looking forward to it from now on.
Yeah~, Producer-san, keep your expectations high~â™ª
